**[Government Tender Announcement]**
**W0134-23A001-24R019 Snow Clearing and Sanding Services CFB Cold Lake**

**Reference Number:** WS4245597657-Doc4245630347

**Publication Date:** February 19, 2024

*The Department of National Defence at 4 Wing, Cold Lake, Alberta requires snow clearing, snow hauling and dumping services, as well as sanding services on an as-and-when required basis.*

**Tender Closing Date:** March 11, 2024 at 2:00 pm EST

*The requirement spans three (3) years, with an option to extend by two (2) one (1) year periods. A site visit is optional, and the tender submission must include all required supporting documentation.*

**Tender Description:**
The Department of National Defence (DND) at 4 Wing, Cold Lake, Alberta, requires the provision of snow clearing, snow hauling and dumping services, as well as sanding services, to be performed at pre-defined and other areas of Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Cold Lake, including the Primrose Lake Evaluation Range. The scope of work includes labor, equipment, operators, and supervision necessary to perform the services.

**Additional Requirements:**

* Security requirements are associated with this requirement.
* The successful bidder must demonstrate the ability to provide services in accordance with the Terms and Conditions of the Contract.
* Bidders must ensure that they meet all applicable trade agreements, including the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

**How to Bid:**

To submit a bid, please visit the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18835236?extsite=MTg4MzUyMzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.

**Contact Information:**
For any inquiries or clarifications, please contact:

Diane Warnell, Diane.warnell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**End of Tender Period:** March 11, 2024 at 2:00 pm EST. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.
